summary: A character reference letter from Kevin Maxwell to Judge Alison J. Nathan in support of Ghislaine Maxwell's bail request. Kevin Maxwell, Ghislaine's brother, attests to her character, honesty, and family relationships, and offers to co-sign a bond secured by family property.

persons.name: Kevin Maxwell
persons.role: Character reference writer, brother of Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Writes a letter to Judge Alison J. Nathan in support of his sister Ghislaine Maxwell's bail request, describing their close relationship and her character.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the bail request and character reference; described by her brother as honest, organized, and caring, with no prior allegations of breaking the law.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: The judge to whom the character reference letter is addressed, presiding over Ghislaine Maxwell's case in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Pandora Maxwell
persons.context: Her properties are offered as security for the $3.5 million bond Kevin Maxwell proposes to co-sign for Ghislaine's bail.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the late individual against whom new charges were brought, with Ghislaine Maxwell stated to have remained in the U.S. jurisdiction to address related allegations.

connections.description: Kevin describes himself as Ghislaine's younger brother, the nearest in age among seven siblings, and states they have always been close since childhood, with regular communication and visits.
Kevin states he has historically and continues to act as one of Ghislaine's closest confidants and advisors, apart from their family relationship.
Kevin refers to Pandora as his ex-wife and states her properties would secure the bond he offers for Ghislaine.
Implied by the context of Ghislaine remaining in the U.S. to deal with allegations related to new charges against Epstein.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's Arrest
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested, as referenced by Kevin Maxwell stating communication ceased after this date.

events.title: Bail Request Character Reference
events.description: Kevin Maxwell writes and submits this character reference letter to Judge Alison J. Nathan in support of Ghislaine Maxwell's bail request.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Kevin Maxwell, Ghislaine's brother, provides a detailed character reference asserting her honesty, organization, and lack of prior legal allegations.
Kevin states Ghislaine remained in the U.S. jurisdiction to be available to address civil or criminal allegations related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Kevin offers to co-sign a $3.5 million bond for Ghislaine's bail, secured by properties owned by his ex-wife Pandora Maxwell.
Kevin describes a close, lifelong sibling relationship with Ghislaine, including regular communication and visits up until her arrest.
Kevin asserts he has never witnessed nor heard any reports of inappropriate behavior from Ghislaine toward his children or grandchildren.
